description:
Your ultimate movie companion.

Seeker brings the world of cinema to your fingertips. Discover the latest blockbusters, browse trending titles, watch trailers, and track your favorite movies — all in one sleek, easy-to-use app.

Whether you're into Hollywood hits, indie gems, or international cinema, this app helps you stay up-to-date and entertained. Never miss a release again with reminders, curated lists, and smart recommendations based on your taste.

Key Features:

- Explore movies by genre, rating, or release date

- Get alerts for new releases and upcoming premieres

- Watch HD trailers instantly

- Create your personal watchlist

- Track what you’ve watched and rate movies

- See reviews, cast, and movie details

- Built-in Password Generator for secure online use

Download now and dive into the world of cinema like never before!

Data Source:

All movie and TV data, including images and descriptions, are provided courtesy of The Movie Database (TMDB).

This product uses the TMDB API but is not endorsed or certified by TMDB

Disclaimer:

It is not affiliated with or endorsed by any third-party content providers or studios.

This app does not stream or host any movies or TV shows.

All trademarks and copyrights belong to their respective owners.

Translate between up to 249 languages. Feature support varies by language:
• Text: Translate between languages by typing
• Offline: Translate with no Internet connection
• Instant camera translation: Translate text in images instantly by just pointing your camera
• Photos: Translate text in taken or imported photos
• Dictation: Translate spoken words and phrases
• Conversations: Translate bilingual conversations on the fly
• Transcribe: Continuously translate someone speaking a different language in near real-time
• Handwriting: Draw text characters instead of typing
• Phrasebook: Star and save translated words and phrases for future reference

Permissions notice:
• Microphone for speech translation
• Camera for translating text via the camera
• Photos for importing photos from your library

The Crosshair for Valorant app is your ultimate guide to discovering and customizing crosshairs used by professional players in Valorant. With a comprehensive collection of over 150+ crosshairs, this app is designed to provide you with detailed insights into the most popular and effective crosshair settings used by top players worldwide. Whether you’re a seasoned Valorant player or just getting started, this app offers everything you need to elevate your gameplay experience.

With the information provided for each crosshair, you can easily replicate, customize, or use the exact settings used by your favorite pros. For those who enjoy experimenting or having fun, the app also includes a collection of troll crosshairs to add a playful twist to your gameplay. Whether you're aiming for competitive mastery or just looking to entertain yourself and your friends, this app has something for everyone.

Key Features
Crosshairs from Professional Players
The app showcases crosshairs used by some of the most famous professional Valorant players. Each crosshair comes with detailed information, including settings, style, and usage tips, so you can fully understand how to replicate it in your own game. This feature not only allows you to play like the pros but also helps you learn how crosshair settings can impact your gameplay.

Troll Crosshairs
Looking for a fun way to spice up your matches? The app includes a variety of troll crosshairs designed to add humor and unpredictability to your games. Use these unique crosshairs to challenge your friends or lighten the mood during casual play.

Search Functionality
Finding your perfect crosshair has never been easier. With the built-in search feature on the main view, you can quickly locate specific crosshairs by typing in a name or keyword. This ensures you spend less time searching and more time playing.

Reflex Game - Train and Improve
The Reflex Game mode is a dedicated feature designed to improve your reaction times and aiming accuracy. Engage in this interactive training experience to sharpen your reflexes, enhance hand-eye coordination, and rank up faster in competitive matches. The Reflex Game is tailored for players looking to climb the ranks all the way to Radiant.

Teams Section
The Teams section offers a curated list of popular professional Valorant teams. Explore brief information about each team and delve deeper into the individual crosshairs used by team members. This feature is perfect for fans who want to follow their favorite teams and players while learning from their crosshair setups.

Random Crosshair Button
The Random button adds an element of surprise by selecting one crosshair from the entire collection. Use this feature to discover new crosshairs, try out different setups, or create fun challenges with your friends. The Random button makes experimenting with crosshairs a seamless and enjoyable experience.

Detailed and Normal Views
Each crosshair comes with both detailed and simplified views. Toggle between these modes to access the level of information you need, from basic settings to advanced customization tips. This flexibility ensures that players of all skill levels can benefit from the app.

Favorites Section
Keep track of your favorite crosshairs by adding them to your personal Favorites list. This feature makes it easy to access your preferred crosshairs anytime without having to search for them repeatedly.

With the Crosshair for Valorant app, you'll have everything you need to take your gameplay to the next level. Whether you want to improve your skills, explore fun crosshair designs, or emulate the pros, this app is the ultimate resource for Valorant crosshairs. Explore, customize, and dominate the game like never before!

- Terms of Use: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/
- Privacy Policy: https://pages.flycricket.io/valo-crosshair/privacy.html

Bible Chat: Built for Christians Who Want to Hear God in the Noise of Everyday Life

Have you made time for God’s Word today? Join millions of believers who’ve chosen the #1 faith app in the world. Download Bible Chat today!

Life is noisy. Fast. Overwhelming. Even when you’re trying to stay close to God, it’s easy to feel spiritually disconnected.

Bible Chat is the ultimate all-in-one Christian app designed to make Bible reading, prayer, and Christian community a part of your everyday life. It is for Christians who want peace - real peace - anchored in Scripture.


Whether you're a lifelong Christian or just starting your journey, Bible Chat gives you everything you need to:

• Understand the Bible Better - Learn what the Bible really means with helpful guides and simple explanations that make God's Word easier to follow and apply.

• Grow Your Prayer Habit - Build a consistent prayer routine supported by daily  inspiration and the power of a praying community.

• Make Faith Part of Your Day - Improve your daily routine with spiritual prompts, Christian calendar reminders, and faith tools designed for the whole family.

• Support Your Mental Health - Find peace and calm in moments of stress with simple tools that help you refocus on God’s strength.

• Make Faith Fun and Interactive - Enjoy fun and easy ways to learn, think, and talk about how faith fits into your everyday life.


Key Features to Explore:

• Daily Plan: Stay on track with your faith. Follow a simple daily plan that helps you grow closer to God, one step at a time.

• Structured Bible Study Plans: Follow simple Bible reading plans made for real life. Some of the topics include: healing, wisdom, leadership, grief, and more.

•  Holy Calendar: See important Christian days in a monthly view. Never miss a feast, saint day, or holy event again.

• Panic Button: Struggling with stress or temptation? Tap the Panic Button for guided deep breathing exercises that calm the mind and provide anxiety relief.

• Live Prayer: Share your prayer intentions, and let's pray together to grow closer to God.

• Send a Blessing:  Send a Bible verse with a kind message straight to a friend’s phone. Add a heart or doodle to make it personal and uplifting.

• Bible Stories for Kids: Turn screen time into faith time! Show fun, Bible-based stories and videos to your kids.

• Multiple Bible Versions: Read the Bible the way you like best. Choose from NKJV, KJV, WMB, FBV, World English Bible, Amplified, and NASB.

• Bible Verse Widget: See a new Bible verse every day, right on your lock screen or home screen.

• Bible Trivia: Challenge and enhance your biblical knowledge through interactive trivia games.

• Verse Locator: Looking for a verse? Search and find it fast, along with what it means.

• Personalized Devotionals & Prayers: Start your day with custom devotionals and write your own prayers to stay closer to God.

• Biblical Character Profiles: Learn about the people in the Bible: their stories, struggles, and how God worked in their lives.

• Let's Discuss Faith: Join honest chats about how faith connects to your real life - like work, family, and relationships.


Experience More with Premium:
Unlock unlimited conversations, full access to every feature, and exclusive designs for your Daily Prayer Widgets. Start with a FREE 7-day trial, then choose our weekly plan at £4.99 or opt for extended plans for greater savings.


Privacy Policy & Terms and Conditions:
https://thebiblechat.com/privacy-policy/
https://thebiblechat.com/terms-and-conditions/


Join Our Thriving Community:
Join a friendly community of people who love God or are just starting to learn. With Bible Chat and the new Send a Blessing Widget, you can make Bible verses and prayer part of your everyday conversations.

Daily life: Translate shopping tags, recipes, news, etc. to help you better understand content in different languages.

Why choose us?
High accuracy: Using advanced translation algorithms to ensure accurate translation results.
User-friendly: The simple interface design makes it easy for you to get started and quickly find the functions you need.
Fast and efficient translation experience, easily cope with various scenarios such as daily conversations, business emails, travel routes, etc.

Let communication without borders, experience seamless global communication. Download the Translate Ease app now and make every communication simple and hassle-free!

Translate text, voice, and photos in 320 different languages. Featuring a keyboard translator and live voice translator.

Whether you need to translate for travel, work, study, or everyday conversation, Translate Now is your ultimate AI-powered language translator. Break language barriers instantly with Translate Now’s multilingual translation tools, making every interaction seamless.

Key Features

▶ Hands-Free Voice Translator for Real-Time Conversations
Effortlessly overcome language barriers with a real-time, hands-free voice translator. Simply speak into your device for instant two-way translation and enjoy multilingual conversations with ease.
▶ Photo Translator for Instant Translation
Translate menus, signs, and pictures instantly with your camera. Just snap a photo for a real-time translation—perfect for travel and navigating world languages.
▶ Keyboard Translator for Multilingual Chat
Type in your native language and send translations live in 60 different languages within any app for effortless messaging.
▶ AI Translator for Instant Text Translation
Translate text with AI-enhanced accuracy, phonetic support, and context-aware translation in 320+ languages.
▶ AR Live Translator for an Immersive Local Experience
Use your camera and augmented reality to translate live, making language learning and travel more intuitive.
▶ AI-Powered Dictionary & Grammar Assistant
Expand your vocabulary with contextual meanings and receive real-time grammar corrections for more precise translations.

Translate Now offers various AI Translation Models, Phrasebook, Watch App, Translation Extension, Offline Mode, Dark Mode, Siri Shortcuts, Interactive Widgets, and SharePlay.

Download Translate Now, your ultimate language translator! Experience the power of language translation at your fingertips. Text, speak, and translate effortlessly between French, Spanish, Japanese, Chinese, Italian, Arabic, German, Urdu, Thai, Korean, Portuguese, Punjabi, Polish, and more!

Azkar App is your daily companion for enhancing spirituality and facilitating Islamic practices. It provides a comprehensive collection of authentic Athkar (remembrances) and supplications from the Qur’an and Sunnah, along with innovative features designed to meet the needs of Muslims in their daily lives.

Join millions of users and experience a complete spiritual journey with Azkar App, crafted to serve every Muslim.

Key Features
- Morning & Evening Athkar, Sleep & Wake-up Athkar, Prayer Athkar, and more: A modern and user-friendly interface with an audio player and repetition counter.
- My Athkar Section: Create and customize your own Athkar according to your needs.
- Qur’an (Reading, Tafsir, and Audio): Enjoy an eye-friendly reading experience with font and color customization, translations in multiple languages, and easy-to-understand Tafsir. You can also listen or download recitations by your favorite reciter.
- Khatmah: Set a Qur’an completion plan with daily reading reminders.
- Prayer Times, Qibla Direction, and Hijri Calendar: View the Islamic calendar, accurate prayer times, and Qibla direction, with a monthly prayer calendar that can be shared.
- Adhan & Full Adhan Alerts: Choose from a variety of Adhan voices with pre-Adhan reminders.
- Reminders Section: Create reminders for specific Athkar, supplications, or important events with customizable sound and repetition options.
- Daily Content Updates: Get Dua of the Day, Ayah of the Day, and Video of the Day with valuable tips and inspiring stories.
- Various Azkar: A variety of supplications with customizable backgrounds, ready for sharing.
- Ramadan Section: Essential Ramadan features including Prayer & Fasting Tracker, Daily Duas, Zakat Calculator, and more.
- Daily Quranic Benefits: Daily insights into Qur’anic verses for contemplation.
- Worship Trackers: Tools to track Athkar, fasting, and prayers, helping you stay consistent and improve commitment.
- Tasbih Counter: Perform electronic Dhikr with an easy-to-use digital Tasbih.
- Ruqyah (Islamic Healing): Authentic Ruqyah texts from the Qur’an and Sunnah, with an audio listening option.
- Prophet Muhammad’s (PBUH) Biography in Videos: Engaging video content about the life of Prophet Muhammad (PBUH).
- 99 Names of Allah.
- Surah Al-Kahf Reminder for Fridays.
- Hajj & Umrah Guide: Step-by-step instructions for performing Hajj and Umrah.
- Islamic & Ramadan WhatsApp Stickers: Updated Islamic and Ramadan sticker packs with easy export to WhatsApp.
- Istighfar (Forgiveness) Alerts: Get reminders for seeking forgiveness and making Dhikr at customizable intervals (e.g., every 10 minutes or once a day).
- Qiyam-ul-Layl (Night Prayer) Alerts.
- Live Activities & Widgets: Quick access to features like prayer times, Hijri date, various azkar, Khatmah, prayer tracker, fasting tracker, and more from the home screen and lock screen.
- Professional & Customizable Design: Choose your favorite background, and enable dark mode for a better visual experience.
- …and many more great features you’ll love!

Why Azkar App?
Azkar App is a comprehensive Islamic tool, combining authenticity with modern technology to fulfill your spiritual and daily needs.

Take this opportunity to increase your daily rewards and strengthen your connection with Allah. Download Azkar App now and embark on an uninterrupted spiritual journey filled with Dhikr and supplication.

HappyMood – Discover Games Made for You

Are you a true gamer looking for one place to explore everything about games? HappyMoods is your ultimate companion! With a huge database of games, you can easily search, discover, and enjoy all the details you need in one simple app.
Explore a Massive Library HappyMood Browse through a wide range of games across different styles and categories. Whether you love action, adventure, puzzle, or strategy, HappyMods brings everything together in one place.
Watch Trailers & Gameplay Before playing, get a real taste of the game! Watch trailers and gameplay videos to see exactly what the game looks like.
Save Your Favorites HappyMood Build your own personalized collection of favorite games. Add the ones you love and come back to them anytime.
Track Games You Like Never lose track of a game again. Follow the games you’re interested in and keep them organized in your list.
Choose Your Mood Not sure what to play? Select your mood and HappyMod will recommend games that match how you feel at that moment. Fun, relaxing, scary, or exciting – there’s always a game waiting for you.
Test Your Knowledge Think you know everything about games? Try our quiz and challenge yourself with fun questions to see how much of a gaming expert you are.
All-in-One Gaming Experience HappyMood makes it easy for you to discover new games, keep track of your favorites, enjoy videos, and even test your knowledge. It’s everything a gamer needs – simple, clear, and always fun.
With HappyMod, finding the perfect game has never been easier.

After measuring blood sugar in life, users can enter the measurement results into our application. Having a good body is the premise of everything.

1. Support multiple languages to serve global users
2. Blood sugar data support entry
3. Popular science of blood sugar related knowledge
4. Health data privacy and security

Disclaimer
This application is designed to provide users with routine health services such as blood sugar data recording and blood sugar knowledge. It should be clear that all content provided by this application does not constitute any medical diagnosis, treatment plan or health guidance advice, nor can it replace the diagnosis, treatment and advice of professional doctors or other healthcare professionals. If you are outside this application, please be sure to consult a professional doctor and follow the doctor's arrangements before making any medical decisions.

Bible Path is a thoughtfully designed app aimed at enriching your spiritual journey with scriptures that offer guidance and holy inspiration. Whether you seek daily inspiration, devotional reflections, or a deeper understanding of the scriptures, Bible Path provides a serene and supportive environment for personal growth.

Key Features:

Bible Chat:
Engage in conversations about faith, prayers, and scriptures with Bible Chat. This feature allows you to explore different interpretations of the scripture, ask questions, and connect with a community of fellow seekers in a holy atmosphere. The chat interface makes it easy to share your thoughts on scriptures and devotional topics with others.

Audio Bible:
Immerse yourself in the holy scriptures through our audio Bible. Perfect for quiet moments of reflection or during daily activities, the narrated scriptures help you stay connected to the Word of God. Whether you’re listening to audio prayers or meditating on the scripture, the app makes it easy to integrate devotional practices into your routine.

Inspirational Verses and Prayers:
Receive a daily dose of inspiration with verses and prayers that uplift and guide you. Each scripture verse and prayer is carefully chosen to offer spiritual nourishment, guiding you in your devotional journey with the holy scriptures.

Personalized Daily Reflections:
Reflect on personalized insights based on the holy scriptures and prayers that resonate with your spiritual needs. These reflections are crafted to help you ponder biblical themes and integrate their teachings into your daily life through consistent devotional practices.

Interactive Bible Studies:
Deepen your understanding of the Bible with our interactive study guides. These resources provide comprehensive insights and context, suitable for both personal study and group discussion, focusing on the holy scriptures to enrich your devotional life.

Faith Building Exercises and Prayers:
Engage in exercises designed to strengthen your faith and understanding, complemented by powerful prayers. These activities encourage you to reflect on scriptures and apply them to your life, guiding you in devotional practices.

Studies and Resources:
Access a wide range of study materials and resources tailored to different levels of biblical knowledge. Whether you are just beginning your journey or seeking advanced understanding of the scriptures, Bible Path provides a supportive resource filled with devotional insights and reflections on the holy scriptures.

Why Choose Bible Path?
Bible Path is a spiritual companion, offering a calm and nurturing space for exploring the scriptures and growing in faith. With tools like chat, audio resources, and study guides, the app is designed to be a gentle guide, helping you find clarity, comfort, and deeper meaning in your spiritual journey.

Download Bible Path and begin a journey of reflection, learning, and spiritual growth. Let this app be a quiet support in your daily life, offering holy guidance and wisdom from the scriptures through prayers, verses, and more.

1. Blurry pictures: Look for blurry photos in your album and delete those that are useless but take up space.
2. Oversized pictures: Some pictures actually need dozens of MB! ? Find them and delete them to give the album a little more space!
3. Screenshots of mobile phones: Now there are more and more screenshots in mobile phones, it doesn't matter if you can't delete them, find them all at once and solve them all!
4. Duplicate pictures: a picture accidentally downloaded many times, a lens accidentally shot many, delete it, leave one of the most satisfied on the line.

【 Album video 】

1. Oversized video: Suddenly running out of storage space on your phone? Do you have a lot of movies stored? One delete done!
2. Duplicate videos: I take a lot of videos of my family, but many of them are the same, it's okay, delete them.
3. Bad video: Many videos downloaded can not play? The original is damaged, delete and re-download!


【 Privacy Album 】
Encrypt albums, save pictures, do not upload to the cloud space, save applications locally, and delete applications with caution

Secure cloud storage, large capacity
Regular users: 50MB

Quran Majeed is an amazing Quran app that beautifies your life with the blessing of reading and listening to the Quran on the go. The latest version of the authentic Quran Majeed app for iPhone and iPad offers complete Quran in the elegant Uthmanic script, audio recitation, translations and English Tafsir Uthmani, proofread by a Muslim scholar ('alim).
القرآن المجيد هو تطبيق مميز للقرآن الذي يجمل حياتك ببركة القراءة والاستماع إلى القرآن أثناء التنقل. الإصدار الأخير من تطبيق القرآن المجيد لأجهزة الآي فون والآيباد تقدم قرآنًا كاملاً في الكتابة العثمانية الأنيقة، وتلاوة الصوت، والترجمات، والتفاسير، وقام بمراجعته أحد العلماء

● Worldwide Prayer Times clock with Azan/Adhan alarm options. Supports different prayer time calculation methods. Qibla direction. Ramadan Sehar/Iftar times
أوقات الصلاة لجميع أنحاء العالم مع خيار تنبيه الأذان، ودعم طرق مختلفة لحساب أوقات الصلاة، وبوصلة القبلة، وأوقات السحور والإفطار

● World famous reciters (Sheikh Abdul Basit, Sheikh As Sudays & As Shraym, Mishari Rashid, Saad Al Ghamdi, Abu Bakr Shatry, Sheikh Ahmed Ajmi, Sheikh Al-Huzaifi, Sheikh Mahir-al-Muayqali, Sheikh Minshawi, Sheikh Ayub, Khalil Husari, Mahmood AlBana, Salah Bukhatir & Sheikh Basfar).
تلاوات القراء المعروفون عالميا.

● Four English translations (Pickthal, Dr. Mohsin, Mahmood & Yusuf Ali) and forty-five language translations (AlBanian, Amazigh, Amharic, Azerbaijani, Bengali, Bosnian, Bulgarian, Chinese, Divehi, Dutch, French, German, Hausa, Hindi, Indonesian, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Malayalam, Malaysian, Norwegian, Persian, Polish, Portuguese, Romanian, Russian, Sindhi, Somali, Spanish, Swahili, Swedish, Tajik, Tamil, Tartar, Turkish, Urdu, Uyghur, Uzbek). 

● Option to display any translation along with full Arabic text in hi-resolution, Retina graphics in both portrait and landscape viewing. Supports pinch/zoom feature for changing font size.
خيار عرض أي ترجمة مع النص العربي الكامل بالدقة الممتازة في وضعي الأفقي والعمودي، دعم ميزة التصغير / التكبير لتغيير حجم الخط.

● Islamic greeting messages (Eid Mubarak, Ramadan Kareem, ...)
رسائل معايدة إسلامية (عيد مبارك، رمضان كريم، ...)

المصحف المرئي مع إيماءة التقليب

● Watch live coverage of Makkah & Madinah.
شاهد التغطية المباشرة لمكة المكرمة والمدينة المنورة.

● Selectable themes (Green, Blue, Classic-Green, Night Mode, Light & Brown).
إمكانية اختيار الثيمات (أخضر، أزرق، الوضع الليلي، فاتح، بني)

● Advanced audio options to help with memorization (repetition of ayah, Surah, number of repetitions, interval, and recitation speed).
خيارات الصوت المتقدمة للمساعدة في الحفظ (تكرار الآية، وسورة، وعدد من حالات التكرار، وفاصل، وسرعة التلاوة).

● Highly advanced “Search” feature that can help with searching any word (search exact word, affixes or all roots) in the Arabic text, any of the translations and English Tafsir.
ميزة بحث متقدم يساعد في البحث عن أي كلمة ( الكلمة بالضبط، كل اللاحقات أو الجذور) في النص العربي، والترجمات والتفاسير

● Bookmarking of Aya, translation and tafsir (supports iCloud synchronization that helps your bookmarks stay up to date on all your iOS devices).
وضع علامة مرجعية على الأية، والترجمة، والتفسير للرجوع إليها

● Quranic Aya and word highlighting during recitation.
تظليل الآية والكلمة أثناء التلاوة

● Social media sharing. Ability to share selected aya via email, twitter & Facebook.
